info.name: PharmaPlusPlus
info.description: This collection contains the API endpoints that manages the internal processes in PharmaPlusPlus - an online drug ordering application.

item.name: Auth

request.description: Allows a new user to self register itself.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to register another user to the application. This endpoint requires authorized access. This endpoint also enables the admin to assign a role to the user at the time of registration.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Verifies the user credentials and returns an accessToken on successful authentication

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to change their own password.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to change their email address.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description: Contains all the endpoints relating to auth or user identity management

item.name: Cart

request.description: Allows a user to add a drug to their cart. Note that if the cart is empty, it will create a cart and add drug and it's specified quantity (given that the specified quantity is present in the store)

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: This endpoint gets all the drugs added to the cart and their specified quantity requested.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to delete a particular quantity of the specified drug from the cart.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: This endpoint deletes the entire cart and removes all the drugs in it.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description: Contains all the endpoints that are used to manage cart related operations, such as adding a drug to the cart with the specified quantity.

item.name: Drugs

request.description: Retrieves all the drug details present in the database.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to add a drug with it's specified details to the database.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Retrieves a drug by it's specified Id.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to delete the drug from the database.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Retrieves a drug by a specified substring in the name.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to update the drug details in the database.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description: Contains all the endpoints related to CRUD in drugs table, ranging from adding a drug to store to searching the drugs. Command Operations like Creating updating and deleting a drug quantity requires the "Admin" authorization.

item.name: Order

request.description: Allows an admin to retrieve all the orders made by the users. If a user is making the request, then retrieves all the orders made by that particular user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to get the list of orders made by a particular user.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to retrieve a particular order by the specified order Id. If the request is made by a user, then it will return the order if it was created by that particular user only.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to submit the final list of drugs added to the cart and produce a static copy of with an order Id.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows an admin to update the order status by given order Id to inform how far the order has processed.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to delete the order created.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description: Contains all the endpoints for ordering of drugs related operations.

item.name: User

request.description: Allows an admin to get a list of all the users in the database. Only available for admins.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to update it's own properties. If the request is made by an admin account then it will allow the updation of properties with the specified user id.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: Allows a user to delete their account.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

request.description: For a specified user Id (if known to a user), allows even user to access other user's profile.

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.description: Contains all the endpoints related to managing generic user properties
